price: 128. Mûssa alobi na bato baye: Bosenga lisungi epai ya Allah mpe bokanga motema. Ya sólo, mabele mazali ya Allah, akitanisaka yango na baye alingi kati ya bawumbu baye; mpe mbano ya malamu ekozala nde тропа babangi.
arabic: قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوۡمِهِ ٱسۡتَعِينُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱصۡبِرُوٓاْۖ إِنَّ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ لِلَّهِ يُورِثُهَا مَن يَشَآءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِۦۖ وَٱلۡعَٰقِبَةُ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla mūsā liqawmihi is'taʿīnū bil-lahi wa-iṣ'birū inna al-arḍa lillahi yūrithuhā man yashāu min ʿibādihi wal-ʿāqibatu lil'muttaqīna
